actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on Acetic acid, [4-2,6-dihydro-2,6-dioxo-7-phenylbenzo[1,2-b:4,5-b']difuan-3yl)phenoxy]-, 2-ethoxyethyl ester.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on Acetic acid, [4-2,6-dihydro-2,6-dioxo-7-phenylbenzo[1,2-b:4,5-b']difuan-3yl)phenoxy]-, 2-ethoxyethyl ester.

titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on Acetic acid, [4-2,6-dihydro-2,6-dioxo-7-phenylbenzo[1,2-b:4,5-b']difuan-3yl)phenoxy]-, 2-ethoxyethyl ester.
A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on Acetic acid, [4-2,6-dihydro-2,6-dioxo-7-phenylbenzo[1,2-b:4,5-b']difuan-3yl)phenoxy]-, 2-ethoxyethyl ester.
